intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you add {description2} to my cart?
intent: The person in the video calls one of the items a 'huge bed'. Can you add the far right item in the same row as the 'huge bed' in the video to my cart?
intermediate_intent: The person in the video calls one of the items a 'huge bed'. What was the the far right item in the same row as the 'huge bed' in the video?

instantiation_dict.description: calls one of the items a 'huge bed'
instantiation_dict.description2: the far right item in the same row as the 'huge bed' in the video

must_include: JTJxop Upholstered Bed, Full Size Upholstered Bed Frame with Headboard, Fabric Modern Bed, Fabric Ottoman Bed Frame, Wood Slat Support,180x200cm
JTJxop Upholstered Bed, Full Size Upholstered Bed Frame with Headboard, Fabric Modern Bed, Fabric Ottoman Bed Frame, Wood Slat Support,180x200cm
